tool_description: Create and chat with your own chatGPT-like chatbots, with personalized instructions and automatic translations.
name: AION
title: AION

api_list.name: List my Bots
api_list.description: Once you have created your bot, you can manage the configurations by using the “access_token” received during authentication. Here you can view a list of all the bots you have created on the platform.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aion.p.rapidapi.com/resources/bot/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aion.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aion.p.rapidapi.com/resources/bot/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aion.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
